alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:27PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM MST... At 327 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkdale, or 14 miles northwest of Camp Verde, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarkdale, Verde Village, Bridgeport, Cottonwood, Jerome, Dead Horse Ranch State Park, Mingus Mountain Campground, Playground Group Campground, Potato Patch Campground, and Tuzigoot National Monument. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 212. State Route 89A between mile markers 336 and 356. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
